de: Der Tropensturm Debby zieht durch die Küste Georgias. Nach Angaben des National Hurricane Center wird Debby voraussichtlich bis zu 25 Zoll Regen über Teile des Südostens bringen.
en: Tropical storm Debby is moving through coastal Georgia. Debby is expected to bring up to 25 inches of rain across parts of the Southeast, the National Hurricane Center has said.
la: Tropical tempestas Debby per Georgiam maritimam movetur. Debby expectatur ad viginti uncias pluviae per partes Meridiani adducendas, quod Centrum National Hurricane dixit.

title: Debby is expected to continue drenching eastern South Carolina
description: While Florida is cleaning up from Hurricane Debby, the storm is still dumping record amounts of rain onto Coastal Georgia and South Carolina.
content: While Florida is cleaning up from Hurricane Debby, the storm is still dumping record amounts of rain onto Coastal Georgia and South Carolina.
de: Es wird erwartet, dass Debby den Osten von South Carolina weiterhin durchnässt. Während Florida sich von Hurrikan Debby befreit, lässt der Sturm immer noch Rekordregenmengen auf die Küsten von Georgia und South Carolina niederprasseln.
en: Debby is expected to continue drenching eastern South Carolina. While Florida is cleaning up from Hurricane Debby, the storm is still dumping record amounts of rain onto Coastal Georgia and South Carolina.
la: Debby expectatur ad orientem Meridionalem Carolinam perfundere. Dum Florida ab Hurricane Debby redigit, tempestas adhuc recordum copiae pluviarum in Georgia Maritima et Carolina Meridionalis redigit.
